data.title: Contact Us

<form action='/contact-us' style='display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:16px;'><input type='text' name='Name' placeholder='John Doe'/><input type='email' name='Email' placeholder='example@mail.com'/><textarea type='text' name='Comment' placeholder='Write some thing here...' rows='6'></textarea><button type='submit'>Submit</button></form>
